get_components()[source]¶

Loads the methods for validation calculations from Core, then builds the cross references needed to track relations between equations (e.g. one equation that fails has TOTREV2 in it, so the program finds all equations with TOTREV2 and displays those also)

get_form_crosswalk()[source]¶
